name: Fernando Flores
bio: Fernando Flores, the dynamic full back of Yucatán Force, electrifies the pitch with his agile runs and precise crosses. Hailing from the vibrant streets of Mérida, his tenacity and relentless spirit embody the soul of his team. Known for his tireless work ethic and eye for assists, he’s a player who thrives under pressure, creating pivotal moments in high-stakes games.
